title: Ticket #4932: Starter should dprintf OOM killer holds
description: When cgroups are enabled, if a job goes over the cgroup memory limits, the OOM killer will fire, the starter will catch an event, and the job will be put on hold with a nice message. However, this nice message doesn't make it into the starter's dprintf log. This will fix that.
remarks: Note: no version history change needed.
